title: Breakdown of the Department of Homeland Security budget by organization 2020
yAxis: Budget authority in million U.S. dollars
summary: This bar chart has 14 columns on the x axis representing Organisation, and Budget authority in million U.S. dollars in each Organisation on the y axis.

The maximum Budget authority in million U.S. dollars 28708.82 is found at Organisation Federal Emergency Management Agency and the minimum is found at Office of Inspector General where Organisation is 170.19.
The difference of Budget authority in million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Organisation is 28538.63.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Budget authority in million U.S. dollars for 14 number of Organisations.
Organisation Federal Emergency Management Agency has the highest Budget authority in million U.S. dollars and Office of Inspector General has the lowest Budget authority in million U.S. dollars.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 14 columns on the x axis representing Organisation, and Budget authority in million U.S. dollars in each Organisation on the y axis.

The maximum Budget authority in million U.S. dollars 28708.82 is found at Organisation Federal Emergency Management Agency and the minimum is found at Office of Inspector General where Organisation is 170.19.
The difference of Budget authority in million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Organisation is 28538.63.
max_summary: This bar chart has 14 columns on the x axis representing Organisation, and Budget authority in million U.S. dollars in each Organisation on the y axis.

The maximum Budget authority in million U.S. dollars 28708.82 is found at Organisation Federal Emergency Management Agency and the minimum is found at Office of Inspector General where Organisation is 170.19.
There is a difference of 28538.63 between the maximum Organisation Federal Emergency Management Agency and minimum Organisation Office of Inspector General.

Budget authority in million U.S. dollars at Organisation Federal Emergency Management Agency is 28708.82 , second place is U.S. Customs and Border Protection at 20850.39, and thirdly is U.S. Coast Guard at 11339.98.
The Organisation Office of Inspector General has 4.37 times less Budget authority in million U.S. dollars than average.
The Budget authority in million U.S. dollars is 92077.53 if we add up values of all Organisations.

data.Organisation: United States Citizenship and Immigration Services
